title: Hair Straightening Brush New Generation by Appolus- Fast Hair Straightener- Iron Brush - Black
features: SALON-FINISH RESULTS. Appolus brush heats up very fast as it is made with professional-grade materials. It is durable with strongly attached bristles and will not pull hair.
STRAIGHTEN ANY TYPE OF HAIR.This brush heats enough to straighten any hair type. 1 minute to heat up to 365F and provides the heat needed to straighten hair by simply brushing it.

3-IN-1 HAIR STYLING PRODUCT. It combines detangling brush, hair straightener and anion hair massager all in one. Easy and convenient to take with you on vacation, beach or anywhere in the world due to its dual voltage 110-220V.

HEALTHY HAIR CARE. The ceramic technology produces negative ions that seals the cuticle, repels humidity and locks in hair color to help resist fading while smoothing and straightening hair. Advanced ionic technology to infuse hair with more moisture and hydration. Tips massage the scalp and stimulate follicles, and natural oil production to give hair a more vibrant, healthy look.
To trun on, press the power button and hold it for 5 seconds.
description: Our salon-grade straightener brush gets you ready easily and quickly for work, dinner out, any family or social event. You can create beautiful shiny hair in minutes, and always look your best. Features: Dual voltage 110V~220V Adjustable Temperature: 365-450F Swivel power cord Auto shut-off protection if NOT IN USE for 60 minutes US safety Plug Instructions: • To turn on, PRESS AND HOLD the power button. It takes 1 minute for the brush to heat up to 365°F/185°C and it keeps at this constant temperature unless you choose another temperature, up to 450°F/232°C. • 365°F/185°C is for all types of hair • 410°F/210°C for natural texture hair. • 450°F/232°C for thick, wavy hair. • Clean your brush on a regular basis. • To change temperature to Fahrenheit, just press the + and - keys at the same time. • To lock your desired temperature, press the power button. To unlock, press again the power key. For better results, use before genuine Argan oil of Morocco or another thermal protector.
